text: from what im reading online, the main way to get how encoder ticks converts when dealing with strafing is using the RUN_USING_ENCODER mode to track what strafing for like 3 seconds is like and how far that moves the robot, then when you have that you can derive an equation/ratio for a strafe with encoders method

STOP_AND_RESET_ENCODERS
) with the depreciated stop & reset to stop the motor, and reset it's ticks traveled/position 2 zero

text: alternatively, you can keep it how the moving forward and backward with encoders works, then apply that same concept with strafing with strafe direction (+ - - +), and if you for example tell it to go 2 feet and it only goes 1.5 feet, then you know the ratio of forward/backward to strafing and can just add a multiplier in the strafe method
